page.title: 15SEA FRONT AMENITIES SOUTHSEA
page.content: Like all seaside resorts Southsea has several amenities along the sea_front.{Kiddies Corner}is a place where children under 7 can go for amusement.It has a swimming pool,a miniature train and remote controlled tanks.It also has many types of rides.People who feel energetic can use the{bowling greens, tennis courts and{putting}or{pitch and putt courses. There is also the {Common},a large piece of grass to play on.For B.M.Xers there is a{B.M.X track}where people can practice their stunts.Inthe same building{skaters}and {skateboarders}can pratice as well.For people who like flowers there are the displays in the{Rock Gardens}and the {Rose Gardens.}Some people like to go boating on the{Canoe Lake}or just sit there and watch the swans.
